subject: AI & Agents
title: Representation Harm vs Allocation Harm
description: One-minute skill: Representation Harm vs Allocation Harm.

hook.text: An image generator only draws white scientists. A loan model rejects Black applicants.

buildup.text: Representation harm: reinforcing stereotypes in content, language, or imagery.

discovery.text: Allocation harm: unfairly distributing resourcesâ€”loans, jobs, healthcare access.

twist.text: Allocation harm is measurable and litigable. Representation harm is subtler but shapes culture.

climax.text: Both matter. Evaluate your system for representation AND allocation impacts.

punchline.text: Harm isn't just denied loans. It's also distorted stories.

quiz.question: What is an example of allocation harm?
